docs.lead_paragraph: Nearly 200 readers responded to ''Maybe It's Time for Plan C'' by Alex Williams (Sunday Styles, Aug. 14), with many sharing experiences about seeking alternatives to the corporate life. Below, excerpts from some of those comments, drawn from nytimes.com. Be prepared for the seven-day workweek, the whole success and failure resting on your shoulders, no sick days, no vacations and no trusting anymore that the economy will get better. Welcome to the real world. It's not pretty.
